plugin.name: perfana-jmeter-maven-plugin
plugin.description: Forked from jmeter-maven-plugin, with perfana integration.

mojo.description:
Goal that configures Apache JMeter bundle.
This goal is also called by other goals.
This goal runs within Lifecycle phase {@link LifecyclePhase#COMPILE}.

parameter.name: CIBuildResultsUrl
parameter.description: Perfana: Build results url where to find the results of this load test.

parameter.name: annotations
parameter.description: Perfana: test run annotiations passed via environment variable

parameter.name: appendResultsTimestamp
parameter.description: Append the results timestamp to the filename (It will be prepended by default if testResultsTimestamp is set to true)

parameter.name: application
parameter.description: Perfana: Name of application that is being tested.

parameter.name: applicationRelease
parameter.description: Perfana: the release number of the application.

parameter.name: assertResultsEnabled
parameter.description: Perfana: Parse the Perfana test asserts and fail build it not ok.

parameter.name: confFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which .conf files are stored.

parameter.name: constantLoadTimeInSeconds
parameter.description: Perfana: Constan load time in seconds.

parameter.name: customPropertiesFiles
parameter.description: Absolute path to JMeter custom (test dependent) properties file.

parameter.name: downloadExtensionDependencies
downloadJMeterDependencies
downloadLibraryDependencies
downloadOptionalDependencies
excludedArtifacts
generateReports
parameter.description: Generate JMeter Reports (this will force your .jtl's into .csv mode)

parameter.name: ignoredArtifacts
jMeterProcessJVMSettings
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all JMeter Process JVM settings.

parameter.name: jmeterArtifacts
jmeterDirectory
parameter.description: Place where the JMeter files will be generated.

parameter.name: jmeterExtensions
jmeterVersion
parameter.description: The version of JMeter that this plugin will use to run tests. We use a hard coded list of artifacts to configure JMeter locally, if you change this version number the list of artifacts required to run JMeter may change. If this happens you will need to override the <jmeterArtifacts> element.

parameter.name: junitLibraries
logsDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter logs are saved to.

parameter.name: mojoExecution
parameter.description: The information extracted from the Mojo being currently executed

parameter.name: overrideRootLogLevel
perfanaEnabled
parameter.description: Perfana: Enable calls to Perfana.

parameter.name: perfanaUrl
parameter.description: Perfana: Perfana url.

parameter.name: postTestPauseInSeconds
parameter.description: Set a pause in seconds after each test that is run.

parameter.name: projectBuildDirectory
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: propertiesFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which .properties files are stored. Defaults to ${basedir}/src/test/jmeter

parameter.name: propertiesGlobal
parameter.description:
JMeter Global Properties that override those given in jmeterProps.
This sets local and remote properties (JMeter's definition of global properties is actually remote properties) and overrides any local/remote properties already set

parameter.name: propertiesJMeter
parameter.description: Absolute path to JMeter custom (test dependent) properties file.

parameter.name: propertiesReplacedByCustomFiles
parameter.description: Replace the default JMeter properties with any custom properties files supplied. (If set to false any custom properties files will be merged with the default JMeter properties files, custom properties will overwrite default ones)

parameter.name: propertiesReportGenerator
parameter.description: JMeter Properties that are merged with precedence into default JMeter file in reportgenerator.properties

parameter.name: propertiesSaveService
parameter.description: JMeter Properties that are merged with precedence into default JMeter file in saveservice.properties

parameter.name: propertiesSystem
parameter.description: (Java) System properties set for the test run. Properties are merged with precedence into default JMeter file system.properties

parameter.name: propertiesUpgrade
parameter.description: JMeter Properties that are merged with precedence into default JMeter file in upgrade.properties

parameter.name: propertiesUser
parameter.description: JMeter Properties that are merged with precedence into default JMeter file in user.properties user.properties takes precedence over jmeter.properties

parameter.name: proxyConfig
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all proxy configurations.

parameter.name: rampupTimeInSeconds
parameter.description: Perfana: Rampup time in seconds.

parameter.name: remoteConfig
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all remote configurations.

parameter.name: reportDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter reports are saved to.

parameter.name: resultsDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter results are saved to.

parameter.name: resultsFileFormat
parameter.description: Set the format of the results generated by JMeter Valid values are: xml, csv (CSV set by default).

parameter.name: resultsFileNameDateFormat
parameter.description: Set the format of the timestamp that is appended to the results filename. (This assumes that testResultsTimestamp is set to 'true') For formatting see http://joda-time.sourceforge.net/apidocs/org/joda/time/format/DateTimeFormat.html

parameter.name: settings
parameter.description: Maven settings

parameter.name: skipTests
parameter.description: Skip the JMeter tests

parameter.name: suppressJMeterOutput
parameter.description: Suppress JMeter output

parameter.name: testConfigFile
parameter.description: The filename used to store the results config

parameter.name: testEnvironment
parameter.description: Perfana: Test environment for this test.

parameter.name: testFilesBuildDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter test files are copied into as part of the build.

parameter.name: testFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which JMX files are stored.

parameter.name: testFilesExcluded
parameter.description: Sets the list of exclude patterns to use in directory scan for JMX files. Relative to testFilesDirectory.

parameter.name: testFilesIncluded
parameter.description: Sets the list of include patterns to use in directory scan for JMX files. Relative to testFilesDirectory.

parameter.name: testPlanLibraries
testResultsTimestamp
parameter.description: Timestamp the test results.

parameter.name: testRunId
parameter.description: Perfana: Test run id.

parameter.name: testType
parameter.description: Perfana: Test type for this test.

parameter.name: useMavenProxy
parameter.description: Use maven proxy configuration if no specific proxy configuration provided

parameter.name: variables
parameter.description: Perfana: test run variables passed via environment variable

mojo.description:
Goal that runs JMeter in GUI mode.
This goal runs within Lifecycle phase {@link LifecyclePhase#TEST}.

parameter.name: appendResultsTimestamp
parameter.description: Append the results timestamp to the filename (It will be prepended by default if testResultsTimestamp is set to true)

parameter.name: confFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which .conf files are stored.

parameter.name: customPropertiesFiles
parameter.description: Absolute path to JMeter custom (test dependent) properties file.

parameter.name: generateReports
parameter.description: Generate JMeter Reports (this will force your .jtl's into .csv mode)

parameter.name: guiTestFile
parameter.description: Supply a test file to open in the GUI once it is loaded.

parameter.name: jMeterProcessJVMSettings
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all JMeter Process JVM settings.

parameter.name: jmeterDirectory
parameter.description: Place where the JMeter files will be generated.

parameter.name: logsDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter logs are saved to.

parameter.name: mojoExecution
parameter.description: The information extracted from the Mojo being currently executed

parameter.name: overrideRootLogLevel
postTestPauseInSeconds
parameter.description: Set a pause in seconds after each test that is run.

parameter.name: projectBuildDirectory
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: proxyConfig
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all proxy configurations.

parameter.name: remoteConfig
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all remote configurations.

parameter.name: reportDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter reports are saved to.

parameter.name: resultsDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter results are saved to.

parameter.name: resultsFileNameDateFormat
parameter.description: Set the format of the timestamp that is appended to the results filename. (This assumes that testResultsTimestamp is set to 'true') For formatting see http://joda-time.sourceforge.net/apidocs/org/joda/time/format/DateTimeFormat.html

parameter.name: settings
parameter.description: Maven settings

parameter.name: skipTests
parameter.description: Skip the JMeter tests

parameter.name: suppressJMeterOutput
parameter.description: Suppress JMeter output

parameter.name: testConfigFile
parameter.description: The filename used to store the results config

parameter.name: testFilesBuildDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter test files are copied into as part of the build.

parameter.name: testFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which JMX files are stored.

parameter.name: testFilesExcluded
parameter.description: Sets the list of exclude patterns to use in directory scan for JMX files. Relative to testFilesDirectory.

parameter.name: testFilesIncluded
parameter.description: Sets the list of include patterns to use in directory scan for JMX files. Relative to testFilesDirectory.

parameter.name: testResultsTimestamp
parameter.description: Timestamp the test results.

parameter.name: useMavenProxy
parameter.description: Use maven proxy configuration if no specific proxy configuration provided

mojo.description:
Display help information on perfana-jmeter-maven-plugin.
Call mvn perfana-jmeter:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

mojo.description:
Goal that runs jmeter based on configuration defined in your pom.
This goal runs within Lifecycle phase {@link LifecyclePhase#INTEGRATION_TEST}.

parameter.name: appendResultsTimestamp
parameter.description: Append the results timestamp to the filename (It will be prepended by default if testResultsTimestamp is set to true)

parameter.name: confFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which .conf files are stored.

parameter.name: customPropertiesFiles
parameter.description: Absolute path to JMeter custom (test dependent) properties file.

parameter.name: generateReports
parameter.description: Generate JMeter Reports (this will force your .jtl's into .csv mode)

parameter.name: jMeterProcessJVMSettings
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all JMeter Process JVM settings.

parameter.name: jmeterDirectory
parameter.description: Place where the JMeter files will be generated.

parameter.name: logsDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter logs are saved to.

parameter.name: mojoExecution
parameter.description: The information extracted from the Mojo being currently executed

parameter.name: overrideRootLogLevel
postTestPauseInSeconds
parameter.description: Set a pause in seconds after each test that is run.

parameter.name: projectBuildDirectory
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: proxyConfig
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all proxy configurations.

parameter.name: remoteConfig
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all remote configurations.

parameter.name: reportDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter reports are saved to.

parameter.name: resultsDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter results are saved to.

parameter.name: resultsFileNameDateFormat
parameter.description: Set the format of the timestamp that is appended to the results filename. (This assumes that testResultsTimestamp is set to 'true') For formatting see http://joda-time.sourceforge.net/apidocs/org/joda/time/format/DateTimeFormat.html

parameter.name: settings
parameter.description: Maven settings

parameter.name: skipTests
parameter.description: Skip the JMeter tests

parameter.name: suppressJMeterOutput
parameter.description: Suppress JMeter output

parameter.name: testConfigFile
parameter.description: The filename used to store the results config

parameter.name: testFilesBuildDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter test files are copied into as part of the build.

parameter.name: testFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which JMX files are stored.

parameter.name: testFilesExcluded
parameter.description: Sets the list of exclude patterns to use in directory scan for JMX files. Relative to testFilesDirectory.

parameter.name: testFilesIncluded
parameter.description: Sets the list of include patterns to use in directory scan for JMX files. Relative to testFilesDirectory.

parameter.name: testResultsTimestamp
parameter.description: Timestamp the test results.

parameter.name: useMavenProxy
parameter.description: Use maven proxy configuration if no specific proxy configuration provided

mojo.description:
Goal that runs JMeter in server mode.
This goal runs within Lifecycle phase {@link LifecyclePhase#TEST}.

parameter.name: appendResultsTimestamp
parameter.description: Append the results timestamp to the filename (It will be prepended by default if testResultsTimestamp is set to true)

parameter.name: confFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which .conf files are stored.

parameter.name: customPropertiesFiles
parameter.description: Absolute path to JMeter custom (test dependent) properties file.

parameter.name: exportedRmiHostname
parameter.description: Exported RMI host name

parameter.name: generateReports
parameter.description: Generate JMeter Reports (this will force your .jtl's into .csv mode)

parameter.name: jMeterProcessJVMSettings
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all JMeter Process JVM settings.

parameter.name: jmeterDirectory
parameter.description: Place where the JMeter files will be generated.

parameter.name: logsDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter logs are saved to.

parameter.name: mojoExecution
parameter.description: The information extracted from the Mojo being currently executed

parameter.name: overrideRootLogLevel
postTestPauseInSeconds
parameter.description: Set a pause in seconds after each test that is run.

parameter.name: projectBuildDirectory
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: proxyConfig
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all proxy configurations.

parameter.name: remoteConfig
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all remote configurations.

parameter.name: reportDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter reports are saved to.

parameter.name: resultsDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter results are saved to.

parameter.name: resultsFileNameDateFormat
parameter.description: Set the format of the timestamp that is appended to the results filename. (This assumes that testResultsTimestamp is set to 'true') For formatting see http://joda-time.sourceforge.net/apidocs/org/joda/time/format/DateTimeFormat.html

parameter.name: serverPort
parameter.description: Port to listen on

parameter.name: settings
parameter.description: Maven settings

parameter.name: skipTests
parameter.description: Skip the JMeter tests

parameter.name: suppressJMeterOutput
parameter.description: Suppress JMeter output

parameter.name: testConfigFile
parameter.description: The filename used to store the results config

parameter.name: testFilesBuildDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter test files are copied into as part of the build.

parameter.name: testFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which JMX files are stored.

parameter.name: testFilesExcluded
parameter.description: Sets the list of exclude patterns to use in directory scan for JMX files. Relative to testFilesDirectory.

parameter.name: testFilesIncluded
parameter.description: Sets the list of include patterns to use in directory scan for JMX files. Relative to testFilesDirectory.

parameter.name: testResultsTimestamp
parameter.description: Timestamp the test results.

parameter.name: useMavenProxy
parameter.description: Use maven proxy configuration if no specific proxy configuration provided

mojo.description:
Goal that computes successes/failures from CSV or XML results files.
This goal runs within Lifecycle phase {@link LifecyclePhase#VERIFY}.
Ensure you set 'scanResultsForSuccessfulRequests' and 'scanResultsForFailedRequests' to true.

parameter.name: appendResultsTimestamp
parameter.description: Append the results timestamp to the filename (It will be prepended by default if testResultsTimestamp is set to true)

parameter.name: confFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which .conf files are stored.

parameter.name: customPropertiesFiles
parameter.description: Absolute path to JMeter custom (test dependent) properties file.

parameter.name: generateReports
parameter.description: Generate JMeter Reports (this will force your .jtl's into .csv mode)

parameter.name: ignoreResultFailures
parameter.description: Sets whether build should fail if there are failed requests found in the JMeter result file. Failures are for example failed requests

parameter.name: jMeterProcessJVMSettings
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all JMeter Process JVM settings.

parameter.name: jmeterDirectory
parameter.description: Place where the JMeter files will be generated.

parameter.name: logsDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter logs are saved to.

parameter.name: mojoExecution
parameter.description: The information extracted from the Mojo being currently executed

parameter.name: overrideRootLogLevel
postTestPauseInSeconds
parameter.description: Set a pause in seconds after each test that is run.

parameter.name: projectBuildDirectory
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: proxyConfig
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all proxy configurations.

parameter.name: remoteConfig
parameter.description: Value class that wraps all remote configurations.

parameter.name: reportDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter reports are saved to.

parameter.name: resultsDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter results are saved to.

parameter.name: resultsFileNameDateFormat
parameter.description: Set the format of the timestamp that is appended to the results filename. (This assumes that testResultsTimestamp is set to 'true') For formatting see http://joda-time.sourceforge.net/apidocs/org/joda/time/format/DateTimeFormat.html

parameter.name: scanResultsForFailedRequests
parameter.description: Sets whether ResultScanner should search for failed requests in the JMeter result file. Defaults to false

parameter.name: scanResultsForSuccessfulRequests
parameter.description: Sets whether ResultScanner should search for Successful requests in the JMeter result file. Defaults to false

parameter.name: settings
parameter.description: Maven settings

parameter.name: skipTests
parameter.description: Skip the JMeter tests

parameter.name: suppressJMeterOutput
parameter.description: Suppress JMeter output

parameter.name: testConfigFile
parameter.description: The filename used to store the results config

parameter.name: testFilesBuildDirectory
parameter.description: Set the directory that JMeter test files are copied into as part of the build.

parameter.name: testFilesDirectory
parameter.description: Path under which JMX files are stored.

parameter.name: testFilesExcluded
parameter.description: Sets the list of exclude patterns to use in directory scan for JMX files. Relative to testFilesDirectory.

parameter.name: testFilesIncluded
parameter.description: Sets the list of include patterns to use in directory scan for JMX files. Relative to testFilesDirectory.

parameter.name: testResultsTimestamp
parameter.description: Timestamp the test results.

parameter.name: useMavenProxy
parameter.description: Use maven proxy configuration if no specific proxy configuration provided
